May 1979: The Love Suicide of Hambei and Ochiyo

Plays:

The Love Suicide of Hambei and Ochiyo (心中宵庚申)

Scenes:

The Village of Ueda (上田村)

The Grocery Store (八百屋)

The Final Trip (道行思ひの短夜)

Characters:

Okaru (姉おかる)

Onabe, a maid (下女お鍋)

Otake, a maid (下女お竹)

Okiku, a maid (下女お菊)

Ochiyo (女房お千代)

Kinzo (百姓金蔵)

Heiemon (島田平右衛門)

Hambei (八百屋半兵衛)

Iemon's wife (伊右衛門女房 (半兵衛母, 八百屋の母))

Tahei (甥太兵衛)

Priest Sainen (西念坊)

Iemon (八百屋伊右衛門)

San, a maid (下女さん)

Matsu, an apprentice (丁稚松)

Buddhist devotee (庚申参り)

Palanquin bearer (駕屋)
